q: Former Republican state Rep. Jackie Walorski , a tea party favorite who narrowly lost her race last year against Democratic Rep. I think he's the clear front-runner, and I think the race is his if he chooses to accept it, Jackie Walorski said.`` I think he'd clear the field.''
